description:
Windows Slimmer will clear temporary files, remove junk, and clean up system files you no longer need to free up disk space and make your system more efficient

Windows Slimmer will clear temporary files, remove junk, and clean up system files you no longer need to free up disk space and make your system more efficient

Windows Slimmer identifies unnecessary files and system clutter, including junk and temporary files, application logs, and memory dumps, then clears them out to free up disk space, making sure that your sensitive data is securely deleted, not just removed. It can also perform a comprehensive Windows Update cleanup, clearing out old update files that are no longer needed.

Wondering how to uninstall programs on Windows 10 and other Windows versions quickly and efficiently? Windows Slimmer is an ideal solution that helps you remove bloatware, software leftovers, and other unwanted apps completely.

Windows Slimmer’s Compact OS feature reduces the size of your Windows installation. If you’re looking for how to clean up your C drive and optimize your system’s performance, it’s one of the easiest solutions.
